CustomField.description: The number entered in this field determines the order in which the services tiles are presented with the lower the number the more important (and thus higher up the list) the tile is.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Leave space for additional services to be inserted between existing ones - eg., use multiples of 10 to start with so the first service in the list is 10, the second is 20 etc. So an additional service can be inserted at 15 if required.
CustomField.label: Priority
